single_cat: In the past moon, m_c has taken {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} place in StarClan. c_n mourns their loss, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} friends and family shared the best, and sometimes the worse, moments of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} life in stories passed around the circle of mourners as the elders carried them to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} final resting place dug for {PRONOUN/m_c/object} out in the forest.
multi_cats: In the past moon, {insert} have taken their places in StarClan. c_n mourns their loss, and their friends and family shared the best, and sometimes the worse, moments of their lives in stories passed around the circle of mourners as the elders carried them to their final resting place dug for them out in the forest.
